biotools.summary:
Integration, exploration, and analysis of high-dimensional single-cell cytometry data using Spectre.

A computational toolkit in R for the integration, exploration, and analysis of high-dimensional single-cell cytometry data.


||| NAME (Spectre) SIMILAR TO (PUB. DIFFERENT) bio.tools/spectre-phylogeny (SPECTRE), bio.tools/spectre (SPECtre)
